text: Panagiotis "Takis" Ikonomopoulos (19 October 1943 â€“ 10 February 2025) was a Greek professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. He made 25 appearances for the Greece national team from 1965 to 1974. Ikonomopoulos died from problems caused by a stroke on 10 February 2025 in Athens, Greece at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Footballers from Athens
title: Takis Ikonomopoulos
